name: com.unity.ide.vscodefork
description: Unity code editor integration for VSCode-based forks (Antigravity, Cursor). Generates csproj/solution files, auto-discovers installations, and launches editors with reuse-window options.

_upm.changelog:
Integration:

- Rename package to com.unity.ide.vscodefork and support VSCode-based forks (Antigravity, Cursor)
